channel.title: Am I the only one who has a problem with Youtube in Whonix Workstation?
channel.description: Can anybody from this community help me with Youtube video? None of the browsers provided support it. It just freezes - no streaming. How come such a trivial thing as Youtube is not supported? I tried all kinds of plugins for Firefox and Chromium that installed - nothing works. Does this distro at all support Youtube? Can anybody suggest what to do?

item.title: Am I the only one who has a problem with Youtube in Whonix Workstation?
